body:
i'm trying to remove tensorflow, cuda, and cuDnn to start the process from the beginning, but i get errors also trying to uninstall tensorflow: 
![ca](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/15125749/36590883-6d9e422e-1890-11e8-9dd2-9e289508df81.PNG)

if i try to install it again, it says it's already present..... is there a way to remove all tensorflow files manually??
